#summary .nfoo Viewer 1.0b
#labels Featured

----
Hi and thanks for visiting this page!

.nfoo Viewer is a project by Fuzzy & Silk.
----

===Features===
{{{
- Viewing your .nfo files directly in foobar
- Choose 5 different text colors
- You can scroll trough your .nfo with the scroll wheel
}}}

===Release Log===
{{{
[2010-04-01] 1.0b    | http://foobar-silk.googlecode.com/files/nfoo_viewer 1.0b.zip
